body: So i was playing on wonderland and.... this person malks1 started swearing ps how to insert a pic?
body_tagged: So i was playing on wonderland and.... this person malks1 started swearing ps how to insert a pic?
title: Ban? Idk but what the heck

replies.body: go to imgur.com, upload the picture there, once done uploading right click the picture and click copy url, after that go to PLAYER REPORTS, write the persons name and what he did in the title and then click the picture image in the top right corner of the box and insert the URL that was copied
replies.body_tagged: go to imgur.com, upload the picture there, once done uploading right click the picture and click copy url, after that go to PLAYER REPORTS, write the persons name and what he did in the title and then click the picture image in the top right corner of the box and insert the URL that was copied

replies.body:
@WylieMason1614, 
If the user you are trying to ban is not a forum user and has not given you permission to make a forum post with his name, don't put his name on your post. 
Look at the buttons when you make a post. I really don't know. I think one of the buttons lets you post a picture.
replies.body_tagged:
@WylieMason1614, 
If the user you are trying to ban is not a forum user and has not given you permission to make a forum post with his name, don't put his name on your post. 
Look at the buttons when you make a post. I really don't know. I think one of the buttons lets you post a picture.

replies.body:
You can always /report players in game.
  • Go to your screenshots.
  • Create an account on http://imgur.com/
  • Upload the screenshot by following the instructions.
  • Farthest right button on your toolbar when creating a post. (The little mountain range with the sun in the back)
  • Right click your picture on Imgur.
  • Click "Copy Image Location" or something similar. Depends on your browser
  • Paste it in the box
  • There you go!
replies.body_tagged:

  • Right click your picture on Imgur.

  • Paste it in the box
  • There you go!

reply_to.body: But how do you find your image that you screen shoted?
reply_to.body_tagged: But how do you find your image that you screen shoted?

replies.body: Are you on a Mac, PC, or Linux device?
replies.body_tagged: Are you on a Mac, PC, or Linux device?

reply_to.body: But how do you find your image that you screen shoted?
reply_to.body_tagged: But how do you find your image that you screen shoted?

replies.body: MAC Device
replies.body_tagged: MAC Device

replies.body: Ok. Open up a finder window. Go up to the "Go" dropdown menu in the upper left-hand corner. When this is open, press the Option (alt) key. A hidden option called "Library" will appear. Click on that. Open the "Application Support" folder. Open the "minecraft" folder. Open the "screenshots" folder. The most recent screenshot will be at the bottom of this folder.
replies.body_tagged: Ok. Open up a finder window. Go up to the "Go" dropdown menu in the upper left-hand corner. When this is open, press the Option (alt) key. A hidden option called "Library" will appear. Click on that. Open the "Application Support" folder. Open the "minecraft" folder. Open the "screenshots" folder. The most recent screenshot will be at the bottom of this folder.

replies.body: What is "go" ? Since you know how to can you take screenshots of you doing it? Or will that not end up working so well?
replies.body_tagged: What is "go" ? Since you know how to can you take screenshots of you doing it? Or will that not end up working so well?

replies.body:
I'll try to describe it better, since I'm not able to easily upload images right now. 
Click on the "Finder" application. It should be on the top or far left of your dashboard (the bar with all the applications on it, either on the left or bottom of your screen). Once that is open, the top-left of your computer will look like this: 
(Apple Logo) Finder File Edit View Go Window Help

Click on Go. A drop-down menu will appear. Once that opens, hold down your "Option" key (bottom row on your keyboard). A hidden option called "Library" will appear. Then follow the instructions in my last post.
replies.body_tagged:
I'll try to describe it better, since I'm not able to easily upload images right now. 
Click on the "Finder" application. It should be on the top or far left of your dashboard (the bar with all the applications on it, either on the left or bottom of your screen). Once that is open, the top-left of your computer will look like this: 
(Apple Logo) Finder File Edit View Go Window Help

Click on Go. A drop-down menu will appear. Once that opens, hold down your "Option" key (bottom row on your keyboard). A hidden option called "Library" will appear. Then follow the instructions in my last post.

replies.body: Okay your advice worked Lieutenantpants, great but now how do i post on to this server??
replies.body_tagged: Okay your advice worked Lieutenantpants, great but now how do i post on to this server??

replies.body:
This part is pretty easy :D

  • Right click your image
  • Click on "Copy image location" or something similar to it
  • Create a new forum post under the Player Reports section
  • In the top right of your text box, click the button farthest to the right.
  • Paste the image in the pop up box
  • Your finished!
replies.body_tagged:
This part is pretty easy :D

  • Right click your image
  • Click on "Copy image location" or something similar to it
  • Create a new forum post under the Player Reports section
  • In the top right of your text box, click the button farthest to the right.
  • Paste the image in the pop up box
  • Your finished!
